title: Riot gifted me an icon for no reason?
body:
So I just finished a ranked game, and qualified for my promos, so as soon as i get into the end game lobby, this thing pops up. It says I have recieved a mystery icon from Riot Games. Well, Im kind of confused considering I have no idea what I did?

So if anyone else has any prior experiences, do you know what this was for? I want to know so maybe if it was something positive on my end, I can keep doing it! ! ! Also, I asked around on my friends list, and no one else has recieved it? Is it because of IEM Oakland or something? (Sorry I dont watch the LCS or whatever its called :( ).

(In case you were wondering it was a TSM one, and I have another account called TSM Boompenguins but Im not sure this makes any difference?)

Thanks!
~Boompenguins
{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Even though this was an error (on the 2013 TSM icon), I still wanna thank you Riot for not one, but two free icons! Is it already Christmas? :D

Huh, I took a look at your account and it looks like you received the Alpha Tester Icon, but also the 2013 TSM Icon. I can't figure out why you randomly received this icon, but if it was due to an error on our side you certainly get to keep it! ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey, Targons Blade. Just wanted to give you a small update that _this_ is the reason the TSM icon is happening:

https://twitter.com/bedraggles/status/801242585465401344

Thank you! Also thanks to Dwarven Giant!!!

{{champion:32}}
I got one aswell :) just wish it was the 2013 curse one cause i didnt have rp at the time to get it

I JUST got one, its like a hand holding a blue hammer or something :s 
https://gyazo.com/d1b3ced1d67bb030caac3d799b043e57
Yeah I got that same icon too
I got the same one too. It was a TSM season 3 icon that got gifted to me by Riot for no reason.
i got this icon too.... i rly don't know why but i am happy :D this icon looks good
